introduction.section1: Himeji is a city located in the Hyogo Prefecture in the Kansai region of Japan. It is above all known for its magnificent castle, considered one of the most beautiful castles in Japan.
introduction.section2: But Himeji is not just about a castle. Take a day and discover the Koko-en Garden, a huge park with multiple gardens and go on an excursion to Mount Shosha.
introduction.section3: Find out our travelogue followed by our detailed visits.

title: Himeji
meta-description: Himeji is above all known for its magnificent castle, considered one of the most beautiful castles in Japan. But Himeji is not just about a castle. Take a day and discover the Koko-en Garden, a huge park with multiple gardens and go on an excursion to Mount Shosha. Through our articles, discover different places to visit. Our travelogue with photos, tips, and advice.
